plot: Homer becomes the most hated man in town after he becomes a tow truck driver, and Marge teaches Maggie to not be an over-dependent baby.

Homer gets a tow-truck and becomes power drunk with impounding everybody's cars. The townsfolk set him up so that he antagonizes Louie,the tow-truck driver from Guidopolis,who imprisons him in his cellar,along with other over-reaching drivers. Fortunately for Homer,Maggie has learnt to be super-independent and rides to the rescue.—don @ minifie-1

Homer takes up the job of tow-truck driver, he becomes driven with his newfound power of impounding and towing cars, his friends turn against him and they set up a trap for Homer, he is soon captured and held prisoner by Louie for setting foot in his territory. Maggie has become independent without her mother tending to her, she soon becomes concerned about her father. Maggie goes on a journey with Santa's Little Helper to rescue her father from Louie. Maggie frees her father, along with the other tow-truck drivers, who were previously imprisoned by Louie.—dawsonpersi
